thread.title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
thread.title_full: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days

title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
text: > Top News FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days FILE - In this Dec. 16, 2014 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter, right, and UEFA president Michel Platini talk before the semi final soccer match between Real Madrid and Cruz Azul at the Club World Cup soccer tournament in Marrakech, Morocco. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days. (AP Photo/Christophe Ena, file)
